item.title: Early Thoughts About Learning Ruby on Rails
item.author: site@michaelgame.dev (Michael)
item.description: Discussing my early thoughts as I work on learning Ruby on Rails. This article talks about how this journey started, how it's going, some of the challenges so far as well as where I'm going next.
